title: Output Schema for getObject Operation
description: Output schema for the getObject operation in the connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the getObject operation.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

result.description: The result object containing response data.

deleteMarker.description: Specifies whether the object is a delete marker.

acceptRanges.description: Indicates that a range of bytes was specified.

lastModified.description: The date and time when the object was last modified.

contentLength.description: The size of the object in bytes.

eTag.description: The entity tag for the object.

contentType.description: The MIME type of the object.

serverSideEncryption.description: The server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object.

partsCount.description: The count of parts for multipart objects.

tagCount.description: The count of tags associated with the object.
